sense.def:
To respect someone
pomeni imeti dobro mnenje o značaju ali zamislih tiste osebe.

seg.quote: He was particularly respected for his integrity.

sense.def:
One's respect for someone
je človekovo dobro mnenje o nekom.

seg.quote: I had an enormous respect and admiration for him.
It is up to you to gain her respect.

sense.def:
To respect someone's wishes, rights, or customs
pomeni prizadevati si, da ne bi naredili česa, kar bi bilo v nasprotju z željami, pravicami ali običaji določene osebe.

seg.quote: She respected his need for peace and quiet.
We must respect the practices of cultures different from our own.

sense.def:
To show respect for someone's wishes, rights, or customs
pomeni prizadevati si, da ne bi naredili česa, kar bi bilo v nasprotju z željami, pravicami ali običaji določene osebe.

seg.quote: ...respect for the rights of the minority.
But Mr Hume, with respect, that wouldn't work.
He informed me about my rights with respect to the forthcoming extradition.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in this respect
pokažemo, da se to, kar govorimo, nanaša na stvar, ki smo jo pravkar omenili.

seg.quote: We are lagging behind in this respect.

sense.def:
In many respects
pomeni na veliko različnih načinov.

seg.quote: He is different from the people around him in many respects.
